mentors.name: Kelvin Kipchumba
mentors.bio: Kelvin is a seasoned software engineer with over 10 years of experience in the tech industry. He has worked on various projects ranging from web development to machine learning. Kelvin is passionate about mentoring aspiring developers and helping them achieve their career goals.

mentors.name: Ian Okumu
mentors.bio: Data Scientist with a passion for uncovering insights from complex datasets. With a strong background in machine learning and statistical analysis, Ian has successfully delivered data-driven solutions across various industries. He is dedicated to helping organizations leverage their data to make informed decisions and drive business growth.

mentors.name: Maryann Kamau
mentors.bio: Maryann is a talented UI/UX designer with a strong background in creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. She has worked on various projects across different industries, helping businesses improve their digital presence and user satisfaction.

mentors.name: David Musembi
mentors.bio: David is a skilled software developer with expertise in full-stack development. He has a strong background in building scalable web applications and has experience working with various programming languages and frameworks. David is passionate about sharing his knowledge and helping others grow in their software development careers.

mentors.name: Abdirahman Salah
mentors.bio: Abdirahman is a highly experienced DevOps engineer with a strong background in cloud computing and infrastructure automation. He has successfully implemented DevOps practices in various organizations, helping them improve their software delivery processes and achieve faster time-to-market.

inquiries.message: Hi Kelvin, I'm interested in learning more about machine learning. Can you tell me about your experience and how you can help me get started?
Hi Ian, I'm looking to improve my data analysis skills. Can you share some insights on how you approach data analysis and what tools you recommend?
